issue.title: Hokuyo link not spinning in Rviz

content.raw:
With the limited FOV and reliability of stereo vision, having the Hokuyo would be very helpful in pathplanning through the door. Not to mention, accuracy from laser returns are typically higher than from stereo vision processing.

Any word on when the fix will be implemented?
